ComicInfo.Title: Turning On
ComicInfo.Summary: Turning On: Seeking more information, Night Man sneaks into Huntâ€™s Nuware lab and winds up in a fight with Tyrannosaurus. Meanwhile, a 5th century king, Theodoric, wakes up and learns his essence has been magically transferred into the new Tekknight II armor. Lance, A Hunt technician, enters the armor with the hopes of energizing it to help in the fight against Night Man.
